dcterms:creator: T. Deruyttere
S. Vandenhende
D. Grujicic
L. Van Gool
M. F. Moens
dcterms:description: The Talk2Car dataset is constructed by adding textual annotations on top of images sampled from the nuScenes training dataset. The text queries consist of commands provided by a passenger to the autonomous vehicle, each associated with an object visible in the scene.
dcterms:title: Talk2Car

dcterms:creator: H. Caesar
V. Bankiti
A. H. Lang
S. Vora
V. E. Liong
Q. Xu
A. Krishnan
Y. Pan
G. Baldan
O. Beijbom
dcterms:description: nuScenes is a multimodal dataset for autonomous driving that includes 3D object boxes, videos, lidar, and radar data obtained by driving a car through Boston and Singapore, covering various weather and lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: nuScenes
